name: CardiacPacer
title: Cardiac Pacer
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for cardiac pacer procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent procedures related to cardiac pacer.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes procedures related to the removal of cardiac pacer.)
